idea-plugin.name: Branch in Window Title
idea-plugin.description: If a version control repository is detected in the module, the current branch name is appended to the project name in the window title. If no version control repository is present, the default behaviour / project name is used. This can be used to automate time allocation to ticketing systems via window managers such as WiseTime.
